Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.lobby

Class LobbyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.lobby.LobbyManager
  • public class LobbyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper for the Lobby class. It manages the creation, modification and deletion of all the Lobby. A Lobby should only be created by instantiating a LobbyManager ad calling it's methods. Different Lobby should be distinguishable throughout a unique value and should never be possible to have more than one Lobby with the same distinctive value at the same time.
    See Also:
    Lobby

    • Field Detail

      • lobbies

        private final java.util.Queue<Lobby> lobbies
        The Queue containing all the Lobby.

      • gameProperty

        private GameProperty gameProperty
        The properties used by all the Lobby. These properties are loaded once from a configuration file by the GamePropertyLoader and will be the same for all of the Lobby.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LobbyManager

        public LobbyManager()
        This is the only constructor. It creates a LobbyManager to handle the Lobby lifecycle.

    • Method Detail

      • loadProperties

        public void loadProperties()
        Loads the Game configuration from the game.cfg file.

      • getLobbyByName

        private Lobby getLobbyByName​(java.lang.String name)
                      throws LobbyNotFoundException
        Returns the Lobby corresponding to the given name, if present into the lobbies list.
        Parameters:
        name - the name corresponding to the Lobby whose presence in lobbies is to be tested.
        Returns:
        the Lobby associated with the given name.
        Throws:
        LobbyNotFoundException - if no Lobby can be found with the given lobbyName.

      • newLobby

        public void newLobby​(java.lang.String lobbyName,
                     java.lang.String password)
              throws LobbyAlreadyExistsException
        Creates a new Lobby with name lobbyName and password password, only if does not exists any other Lobby having the given lobbyName.
        Parameters:
        lobbyName - the new Lobby name.
        password - the new Lobby password.
        Throws:
        LobbyAlreadyExistsException - if another Lobby having the same lobbyName is already present into lobbies list.

      • add

        public void add​(java.lang.String lobbyName,
                Player player,
                java.lang.String password)
         throws LobbyNotFoundException,
                LobbyFullException,
                PlayerAlreadyAddedException,
                InvalidPasswordException,
                GameAlreadyStartedException
        Adds a given Player to an existing Lobby if the given lobbyName refers to a valid Lobby.
        Parameters:
        lobbyName - the name corresponding to the Lobby the Player wants to be added to.
        player - the Player to be added to the chosen Lobby.
        password - the password corresponding to the Lobby the Player wants to be added to.
        Throws:
        LobbyNotFoundException - if no Lobby can be found with the given lobbyName.
        LobbyFullException - if the Lobby corresponding to the given lobbyName is full.
        PlayerAlreadyAddedException - if another instance of Player has been already added to the chosen Lobby.
        GameAlreadyStartedException - if the Game has already started.
        InvalidPasswordException - if the given password does not correspond to the password for the chosen Lobby.

      • remove

        public void remove​(java.lang.String lobbyName,
                   Player player)
            throws LobbyNotFoundException,
                   PlayerNotFoundException,
                   LobbyEmptyException
        Removes the given Player from an existing Lobby if exists. Then deletes the given Lobby if no other Players are left into it.
        Parameters:
        lobbyName - the Lobby name from which the Player has to be removed.
        player - the Player to remove from the chosen Lobby.
        Throws:
        LobbyNotFoundException - if no Lobby can be found with the given lobbyName.
        PlayerNotFoundException - if the given Player can't be found into the chosen Lobby.
        LobbyEmptyException - if an attempt to remove a Player from an empty Lobby has been made.

      • getLobbyNameByPlayer

        public java.lang.String getLobbyNameByPlayer​(Player player)
                                      throws PlayerNotFoundException
        Returns a String representing the name of the Lobby in which the given Player is logged.
        Parameters:
        player - the Player whom Lobby name has to be found.
        Returns:
        the name of the Lobby containing the given Player.
        Throws:
        PlayerNotFoundException - if the given Player can't be found into the chosen Lobby.

      • getLobbiesStatus

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getLobbiesStatus()
        Returns a Map containing, for each Lobby, a Map.Entry representing the status of each Lobby. A Lobby status is retrieved via Lobby.getStatus().
        Returns:
        the status for each Lobby.
        See Also:
        Lobby.getStatus()

      • notifyOpponentsUpdate

        public void notifyOpponentsUpdate​(java.lang.String lobbyName)
                           throws LobbyNotFoundException
        Notifies the Players in the Lobby corresponding to the given lobbyName about the update in his opponents list.
        Parameters:
        lobbyName - the Lobby whose Players have to be notified.
        Throws:
        LobbyNotFoundException - if no Lobby containing the given player can be found.

      • notifyTimeUpdate

        public void notifyTimeUpdate​(java.lang.String lobbyName)
                      throws LobbyNotFoundException
        Notifies the Players in the Lobby corresponding to the given lobbyName about the update of the countdown state.
        Parameters:
        lobbyName - he Lobby whose Players have to be notified.
        Throws:
        LobbyNotFoundException - if no Lobby containing the given player can be found.
